description:
**Problem**
Phase 2 tests need canonical CBOR fixtures and apply test harness.

**Context**
- REALTIME_PLAN.md §18: canonical hashing stability, apply idempotence
- Blocks Phase 2 testing bead

**Design**
Create test infrastructure:
- Golden CBOR fixtures: known EventBody → known sha256 (cross-platform stable)
- EventBody test factories with deterministic stamps/IDs
- Apply test harness: CanonicalState setup + apply + verify helpers
- Fingerprint comparison utilities

**Acceptance**
- [ ] tests/fixtures/cbor.rs with golden CBOR bytes + expected hashes
- [ ] tests/fixtures/event_body.rs with EventBody builders
- [ ] tests/fixtures/apply_harness.rs with apply + verify helpers
- [ ] Golden fixtures verified manually on multiple platforms (macOS, Linux)

**Files:** tests/fixtures/cbor.rs (new), tests/fixtures/event_body.rs (new), tests/fixtures/apply_harness.rs (new)
title: Phase 2 test infrastructure: CBOR fixtures + apply harness
